1.Mash together the cream cheese, chilies, garlic if using, salt and pepper
2.Stir in shredded cheese
3.Mix together 2 tbsp flour and just enough water to make a paste
4.Put a teaspoon full of the cheesy mix and form a samosa
![Image of recipe](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
5.Shallow fry 1-2 minutes on each side until golden. You can also air fry these - just remember to lightly brush with oil!
6.Serve hot!
